g.text: A complete product planning template with 46 feature specifications
SVG wireframes, SpecKit workflow, and constitution-driven development
As a visitor, I need to understand what
As a developer, I need to see key
features at a glance to evaluate.
As a new user, I need clear CTAs
so I can begin using the template.
As an evaluator, I need quality

svg.text: hero section | feature cards | CTA buttons | responsive grid
